name: FAUST
description: FAUST is a game created by WALK Interactive. In FAUST you go around shooting enemies, like any other game that includes a gun, but our game is unique through the fact that your main way of moving, is by shooting. A majority of the monsters in FAUST are based off of Japanease folklore. Will you survive the apocalypse and save your family, or will you fall victim to the monsters.
